entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
